definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: secrecy, mystery ;—abs. [[לָט]] 1Sa 18:22 + 2 t., [[לָאט]] Ju Jdg 4:21; pl. sf. [[לָטֵיהֶם]] Ex 7:22 + 2 t.; [[לַהֲטֵיהֶם]] Ex 7:11; —alw.c. [[בְּ]]:
[[בְּלָטֵיהֶם]] with their mysteries = enchantments (i. e. of [[חַרְטֻמֵּי מִחְרַיִם]]) Ex Ex 7:22, Ex 8:3, Ex 8:14 = [[בְּלַהֲטֵיהֶם]] Ex 7:11 (all P).
